name: Steam Machine Fight
description:
A competitive resource management game. Fight with other players to score points by keeping your machines optimal while trying to sabotage others.

This was a prototype we made for a class project and is missing some important gameplay elements that we were not able to complete and integrate in time.

Multiplayer can only be done locally. However, if you use a program such as Parsec to connect remotely to the hosting players PC, you should still be able to play together properly.

Controls:

Player 1 (Orange Hat)

Up --> W

Down --> S

Right --> D

Left --> A

Interact --> TAB

Player 2 (Blue Hat)

Up --> I

Down --> K

Right --> L

Left --> K

Interact --> Space Bar

Player 3 (Yellow Hat)

Up --> Up Arrow

Down --> Down Arrow

Right --> Right Arrow

Left --> Left Arrow

Interact --> Enter

Player 4 (Green Hat)

Uses a Controller, base settings are for an Xbox Controller

Move --> Left Thumbstick

Interact --> TAB
